alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 03 at 8:35AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Thunderstorms with heavy rain may bring quick rises to area streams and creeks, as well as areas with poor drainage. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Daniels, Dawson, Roosevelt, Richland, Sheridan, and Wibaux. * WHEN...From this evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with heavy rain have the potential to bring quick rises to area streams and creeks, as well as areas with poor drainage. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Daniels; Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; Richland; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt; Wibaux
